text: Sex Machine Today is the 40th studio album by American musician James Brown. The album was released in May 1975, by Polydor Records. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== *James Brown - lead vocals, arrangements *Fred Wesley - production supervision, arrangements *Bob Both - production supervision, engineer *David Stone, Major Little - assistant engineer *Roger Huyssen - artwork ==References== Category:1975 albums Category:James Brown albums Category:Polydor Records albums
title: Sex Machine Today
